title: Commenting on a child's growth
context: Remark on how much taller or older a child looks since you last saw them.

content.bestLine: You've grown so much since I last saw you!

neutral.text: You're getting taller every time I see you
I can see you've grown a lot
You look older than I remember
It's amazing how fast you're growing up
You've really shot up since last year
I barely recognized you, you've grown so much
You're becoming a big kid now

informal.text: You're growing up to be a tall one, huh?
I can barely believe how much you've grown
You're looking more grown-up every time I see you
It's crazy how fast kids grow up, right?
You're getting to be as tall as your mom/dad
I swear, you've grown like a foot since last time

formal.text: You've exhibited significant growth since our last meeting
I notice you've increased in height considerably
It's a pleasure to see you're growing and thriving
You're maturing into a fine young individual

patterns.template: You've grown [options] since I last saw you
